name: Swabbie Stevie
description:
It's another day for Stevie the Swab, the lowest of the low on the pirate hierarchy. Be careful not to anger the wrath of the captain! Peel potatoes, clean decks, and-are we under attack? Man cannons!

Game by dododot for the Weekly Game Jam. Sound from freesound.org and music from Shane Ivers. Check out my twitter here for more infrequent updates about games I make.
